model_file.description: Name of the pretrained model file

model_name.description: Name of the HuggingFace model to load. Required for the Classifier model.

model_path.description: Directory containing fine-tuned classifier model, relative to classifier.py directory. Required for the Classifier model.

model_name.description: Name of the HuggingFace model to load. Required for the Causal model.

model_path.description: Pretrained model path, relative to causal.py directory. Blank if using HuggingFace model

model_types.description: Defines the types of models to be used by the mixture model.

model_weights.description: Defines the weights of models to be used by the mixture model. Must sum to 1.

model_params.description: Defines the extra parameters of models to be used by the mixture model.
